John had just come back from a long day at work, and he was looking forward to relaxing at home.
However, as he was about to open the door to his apartment, he heard a strange noise coming from inside.
As he knows his roommate Jane well at this point, he immediately realized something was up, and thought to himself 'just what is that lunatic up to now?'.
Creaked the door open, he first saw an ordinary sight - Jane standing there, holding a drink in her hand.
However, as he opened the door further, he saw something that made him do a double take - an ostrich was standing next to her.
John was taken aback by the sight, wondering both what was going on, and just how an ostrich ended up in his apartment.
Not only that, the ostrich seemed perfectly at home, as if it had been living there for years.
He knew that Jane was a bit eccentric, but this was a whole new level of weirdness.
Trying to start figuring out what was going on, he asked Jane, "Whatcha got there?" to which she answered:

. Definitely not an ostrich.
. A smoothie.
. An ostrich.
. A drink, want some?

---

John had just come back from a long day at work, and he was looking forward to relaxing at home.
However, as he was about to open the door to his apartment, he heard a strange noise coming from inside.
As he knows his roommate Jane well at this point, he immediately realized something was up, and thought to himself 'just what is that lunatic up to now?'.
Creaked the door open, he first saw an ordinary sight - Jane standing there, holding a drink in her hand.
However, as he opened the door further, he saw something that made him do a double take - an ostrich was standing next to her.
John was taken aback by the sight, wondering both what was going on, and just how an ostrich ended up in his apartment.
Not only that, the ostrich seemed perfectly at home, as if it had been living there for years.
He knew that Jane was a bit eccentric, but this was a whole new level of weirdness.
Trying to start figuring out what was going on, he asked Jane, "Whatcha got there?" to which she answered:
